### Audio

Beta version.

Simulation for sound frequencies. Currently one can change:

* rootSound
* Pitch
* Transposition
* Type (Equal, PureMajor, PureMinor)

### Usage

```
info = Audio::Tuning::Info.new(442, "equal", "C", "C")
tuning = Audio::Tuning::Engine.generateTuningByInfo(tuningInfo: info)
pp tuning
```

which generates:
